description:
One of Emperor Darius` generals. Has thick armor which doesn`t allow anyone to see Proist`s face. Proist has as a mechanical voice and very silent temper until the moment of reveal Proist`s true individuality.
She is actually a Emperor Darius` daughter. She has split personality so she can be kind and merciless at the same time. She hates humanity and all human-related things except classical music. She is fond of Antonín Dvořák, and even names her mech (Dvořák) as a tribute to a composer.
name: Proist
